ingredients.item: 2 tbsp fresh Waitrose Green Pesto With Basil
170g pack Waitrose Poached Scottish Salmon Fillets, skinned and broken into large flakes

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in a large saucepan of boiling water for 8 minutes until almost done.
Add the peas to the pan and cook for a further 2 minutes until the pasta and the peas are both tender. Reserve a ladleful of the cooking water, then drain the pasta and return to the pan.
Add the soft cheese, pesto and salmon to the pan, along with the reserved cooking water and gently stir together.
Divide the pasta and sauce between two bowls, top with some freshly ground black pepper and a few basil leaves, and serve with a large bowl of green salad on the side.
